Package com.apaulin.nso_controller.http.rpc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RPC  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Abort
    Abort a JSON-RPC method by its associated id.
    AbortCommit
    Aborts the active read-write transaction
    AppendListEntry
    Append a list entry to a leaf-list.
    ClearValidateLock
    Releases validate lock taken by validate_commit
    Commit
    Copy the configuration into the running datastore.
    CommitOptions
    Return a commit StringArray of commit option
    ConfirmCommit
    Confirms the currently pending confirmed commit
    Create
    Create a list entry, a presence container, or a leaf of type empty
    Delete
    Deletes an existing list entry, a presence container, or an optional leaf and all its children (if any)
    DeleteTrans
    Deletes a transaction created by new_trans or new_webui_trans
    Exists  
    GetAttrs
    Get node attributes
    GetCase
    Get the case of a choice leaf
    GetCmds
    Get a list of the session's batch commands
    GetLeafRefValues
    Gets all possible values for a leaf with a leafref type
    GetListKeys
    Enumerates keys in a list.
    GetSchema
    Schema Request
    GetSystemSetting
    Extracts system settings such as capabilities, supported datastores, etc.
    GetTemplateVariables
    Get node attributes
    GetTrans
    Request the transaction number
    GetValue
    Gets a leaf value
    GetValues
    Get leaf values
    KickUser
    Kills a user session, i.e.
    Load
    Load XML/JSON configuration into current transaction The data param is the data to be loaded into the transaction.
    LoadString
    Load XML/JSON configuration into current transaction The data param is the data to be loaded into the transaction.
    Logout
    Removes a user session and invalidates the browser cookie
    NewTrans
    New JSON-RCP transaction
    RpcData
    Define the main RPC request body
    RunAction  
    SetTransactionComment
    Set a transaction comment to the current transaction
    SetValue
    Sets a leaf value The path param is the keypath to give a new value as specified with the value param.
    ShowConfig
    Retrieves a compact string representation of the configuration
    ValidateCommit
    Validates a transaction before calling commit.
    ValidateTrans
    Validates a transaction
